FinServ_FinancialHolding__c.name: FinServ_FinancialHolding__c
FinServ_FinancialHolding__c.description: Represents a financial holding in an investment account, such as shares of stock.

AssetCategory__c.description: Subcategory of asset type. Valid values: U.S. Equity Sector Equity Allocation International Equity Alternative Commodities Taxable Bond Municipal Bond

AssetCategoryName__c.description: Market capitalization and investing style. Valid values: Large Growth Large Value Large Blend Small Growth Small Value Small Blend Mid-Cap Growth Mid-Cap Value Mid-Cap Blend

AssetClass__c.description: Major category of asset type. Valid values: Equities Fixed Income Cash Equivalents Alternative Investments

CurrencyIsoCode.description: If multiple currencies is enabled, contains the currency ISO code associated with the record.

FinancialAccount__c.description: Financial account that this holding is related to.

Household__c.description: Household that this holding rolls up to.

LastActivityDate.description: Timestamp for when this financial holding last had a task or event action associated with the record.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastUpdated__c.description: Timestamp for when data for this holding was last updated by an external data source.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

PercentChange__c.description: Percent change in value since purchase.

PurchasePrice__c.description: Price per-share at time of purchase.

Securities__c.description: Name of the securities held. Label is Symbol.

SourceSystemId__c.description: ID that uniquely identifies the holding in an external data source.

Symbol__c.description: Ticker symbol for the securities held. The value is copied from Securities__c and canâ€™t be changed.
